@@ -20,8 +20,18 @@
   const handleObserver = () => {
     console.log("1111")
   }
 
+  useEffect(() => {
+    const observerOption = {
+      root: null,
+      rootMargin: "0px",
+      // threshold :
+    }
+    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(handleObserver, observerOption)
+    observer.observe(threeColumnsRef)
+  }, [])
+
